description: This instance should target arguments passed by reference to a function.

discovery.notes: This rule searches fo `SEND_REF` in the opcode, which is the opcode equivalent for passing values by reference to a function. Therefot the rule should be Perfect.

remediation.notes: If possible, one could avoid passing the values by reference, instead, one could explicitly return those values from the function, so that the function has no side effects on the input values.
